column6:
THE EARTH-SHATTERING CONCLUSION! ,2005,6
The Vault is completed, and it's worst-case scenario time. The Fantastic Four have spent the last few months gathering their greatest foes into one place--a safe place--but now something has gone wrong and they're faced with the combined might of all their foes. The FF are locked in a dire battle for their very LIVES. Who lives? Who dies? Will any of the FF live through this ordeal? (Man, it'd be a lot easier to fool you guys if that movie wasn't coming out.)
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Claudio Castellini | colorist:Bill Crabtree | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller:Cliff Rathburn | letterer:Clem Robins
